name: Madoka Magica - No Longer Alone
description:
Mami Tomoe is the feature of this theme! Includes a custom header, dash menu icons and a different font face!
Works best with Google Chrome, not tested in other browsers. Why would you use another browser other than chrome anyway??

My other styles:
Sailor Moon - Hikari no Senshi: http://userstyles.org/styles/75397/sailor-moon-hikari-no-senshi
Sailor Moon - Lavender & Lace: http://userstyles.org/styles/74662/sailor-moon-lavender-lace
Sailor Moon - Starlight Pirouette: http://userstyles.org/styles/75386/sailor-moon-starlight-pirouette
Sailor Moon - Pink Sugar Dash Attack: http://userstyles.org/styles/74459/sailor-moon-pink-sugar-dash-attack


NOTE - Watermark will not appear across dash!
NOTE 2 - Artwork/Icons belong to their respective owners.

Enjoy!
